text: A near death experience (NDE) is when someone almost dies and then he feels things like his life flashes before his eyes. Some have said they briefly saw heaven or hell. NDEs were made mostly famous by the making of Raymond Moody's Life After Life in 1975. ==Related pages== *Bruce Greyson *Parapsychology *Life Before Life *The Little Match Girl ==Other websites== *Near Death Experience Research Foundation Category:Psychiatry Category:Death Category:Afterlife
